full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'GONG PO BKAR BA'I MDOS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI CHOS MDZAD BLA MING GIS SNGON GYI YIG RNYING 'DRA MIN SNA TSOGS YOD PA RNAMS LA'ANG BRI BSNON CUNG ZAD BCOS SHING MGO MJUG TU BSANGS DANG GA-YANG 'GUG SOGS DANG 'BREL BAR BYAS NA 'BREL CHAGS SHING PHAN THOGS PAR BSAMS NAS BSGRIGS PA 'DIS 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
